name: Sin Cycle
description:
You wash the clothes, the sins go away, the people go to heaven.

How to play:

  • Load laundry from clients on the left.
  • Clean in washer mode.
  • Distribute clean laundry to same clients on the right.

Hit 60% cleanliness to move to next stage.

Controls:

Z: Switch mode (Clients / washer)
X: Take & Distribute laundry
Left/Right keys: rotate customers or apply wash force.
